definition: a failure to maintain a higher state
details:
noun
- a failure to maintain a higher state
= synonyms: backsliding
- returning to a former state
= synonyms: retrogression, retroversion, regression, regress
- turning in the opposite direction
= synonyms: reversal, turnabout, turnaround, reverse
- a reappearance of an earlier characteristic
= synonyms: atavism, throwback
- a return to a normal phenotype, usually resulting from a second mutation
= example: a return to a normal phenotype, usually resulting from a second mutation
- (law) an interest in an estate that reverts to the grantor (or his heirs) at the end of some period (e.g., the death of the grantee)
